content.raw:
worked very well for grasping of cylinder and cordless drill using [this script](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c756dd16a2ead99291f6641f9e54ffee8c6228ab/grasp.bash?at=grasp_exp_john) and [this launch file](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c756dd16a2ead99291f6641f9e54ffee8c6228ab/drcsim_gazebo/launch/grasp_exp.launch?at=grasp_exp_john) when running from the `grasp_exp_john` branch:
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo grasp_exp.launch  model_args:="_v4" extra_gazebo_args:="--verbose" hand_suffix:="_robotiq_hands"
~~~
content.html:
worked very well for grasping of cylinder and cordless drill using this script and this launch file when running from the grasp_exp_john branch:

roslaunch drcsim_gazebo grasp_exp.launch  model_args:="_v4" extra_gazebo_args:="--verbose" hand_suffix:="_robotiq_hands"
